main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects reported over Brattleboro, Vermont by witnesses, with descriptions of lights and movement patterns.
interesting points: The observer claims to have seen UFOs frequently on clear nights., Descriptions included lights changing colors and hovering silently., Witnesses expressed feelings of being under constant surveillance by UFOs., Several sightings reported over a period, indicating a possible ongoing phenomenon., A handwritten request for investigation into the sightings was included.
sighted object: lights with various colors in the sky
witness description: The observer and their family have extensive experience with UFO sightings, claiming to have seen them frequently over the years.
